channel.title: OpenVPN on ninjaduck
channel.description: Recent content in OpenVPN on ninjaduck

item.title: Multi-Factor Authentication In OpenVPN
item.description: This project was done as a part of Mozilla Winter of Security 2014 programme. The objective of this project is to implement native Multifactor Authentication Support for OpenVPN. The existing support for Multifactor Authentication in OpenVPN is through deferred C plugins and pythons scripts which has lots of limitations due to the nature they are implemented. Need to Native MFA support The plugins are present on the server side where they are called at appropriate places in the authentication process of OpenVPN with credentials.
